analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#669-701):
	External calls:
	- _processPurchase(_beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#693-694)
	- tokensSold = allCrowdSaleTokens.sub(token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#701)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _forwardFunds() (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#697)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#701)

MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#186) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#269-290)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#353-373)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#401-412)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#416-429)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#485-488) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#300-315):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#312-313)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#313-314)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#512-524) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#518-522)

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#726-729) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#729)

EmaCrowdSale.tranferPresaleTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(this,investor,ammount) (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#455-456) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#489-495)

EmaCrowdSale.constructor.wallet (local variable @ /unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.wallet (state variable @ /unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#626-627)

EmaCrowdSale.constructor.token (local variable @ /unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.token (state variable @ /unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#626)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#485-488)
	- /unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#486-488

Crowdsale.allCrowdSaleTokens should be constant (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#629-631)
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/18/0x2821fb31998e60d220ff52af6299872f25a3e149.sol#164)
